Metric.Name: Drought days
Metric.SQL: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN (Drought_Condition = 1) then 1 end) as L1, COUNT(CASE WHEN (Drought_Condition = 2) then 1 end) as L2, COUNT(CASE WHEN (Drought_Condition = 3) then 1 end) as L3 FROM {ScenarioTable}

Metric.Name: Daily Habitat Series
Metric.SQL: SELECT DateVal, InterHabitat FROM (Select DateVal, yearInt, CASE WHEN dayInt>1000 THEN yearInt+1 ELSE yearInt END as WaterYear, ((LowVal + ((HighVal - LowVal) * (Flow - LowFlow)/(HighFlow - LowFlow))) / {normalization} * {reachLength})/10000 AS InterHabitat FROM (SELECT {scenariotable}.Date as DateVal, CAST(strftime('%Y', {scenariotable}.Date) AS INT) AS yearInt, (CAST(strftime('%m', {scenariotable}.Date) AS INT)*100 + CAST(strftime('%d', {scenariotable}.Date) AS INT)) AS dayInt, {scenariotable}.{scenarioabbrev} AS Flow, {lookuptable}.LowFlow AS LowFlow, {lookuptable}.HighFlow AS HighFlow, {lookuptable}.{lowvalue} AS LowVal, {lookuptable}.{highvalue} AS HighVal FROM ({lookuptable} INNER JOIN {scenariotable} ON {scenariotable}.{scenarioabbrev} >= {lookuptable}.LowFlow AND {scenariotable}.{scenarioabbrev} < {lookuptable}.HighFlow)) WHERE {dateRange} AND WaterYear BETWEEN {startyearlimit} AND {endyearlimit} ORDER BY DateVal)

Metric.Name: Minimum single habitat
Metric.SQL: SELECT WaterYear, MIN(InterHabitat) AS InterHabitat FROM (Select DateVal, yearInt, CASE WHEN dayInt>1000 THEN yearInt+1 ELSE yearInt END as WaterYear, ((LowVal + ((HighVal - LowVal) * (Flow - LowFlow)/(HighFlow - LowFlow))) / {normalization} * {reachLength})/10000 AS InterHabitat FROM (SELECT {scenariotable}.Date as DateVal, CAST(strftime('%Y', {scenariotable}.Date) AS INT) AS yearInt, (CAST(strftime('%m', {scenariotable}.Date) AS INT)*100 + CAST(strftime('%d', {scenariotable}.Date) AS INT)) AS dayInt, {scenariotable}.{scenarioabbrev} AS Flow, {lookuptable}.LowFlow AS LowFlow, {lookuptable}.HighFlow AS HighFlow, {lookuptable}.{lowvalue} AS LowVal, {lookuptable}.{highvalue} AS HighVal FROM ({lookuptable} INNER JOIN {scenariotable} ON {scenariotable}.{scenarioabbrev} >= {lookuptable}.LowFlow AND {scenariotable}.{scenarioabbrev} < {lookuptable}.HighFlow)) WHERE {dateRange} ORDER BY WaterYear, InterHabitat) WHERE WaterYear BETWEEN {startyearlimit} AND {endyearlimit}

Metric.Name: Average of bottom 25% of habitat
Metric.SQL: SELECT WaterYear, aveBottom25(InterHabitat) AS InterHabitat FROM (Select DateVal, yearInt, CASE WHEN dayInt>1000 THEN yearInt+1 ELSE yearInt END as WaterYear, ((LowVal + ((HighVal - LowVal) * (Flow - LowFlow)/(HighFlow - LowFlow))) / {normalization} * {reachLength})/10000 AS InterHabitat FROM (SELECT {scenariotable}.Date as DateVal, CAST(strftime('%Y', {scenariotable}.Date) AS INT) AS yearInt, (CAST(strftime('%m', {scenariotable}.Date) AS INT)*100 + CAST(strftime('%d', {scenariotable}.Date) AS INT)) AS dayInt, {scenariotable}.{scenarioabbrev} AS Flow, {lookuptable}.LowFlow AS LowFlow, {lookuptable}.HighFlow AS HighFlow, {lookuptable}.{lowvalue} AS LowVal, {lookuptable}.{highvalue} AS HighVal FROM ({lookuptable} INNER JOIN {scenariotable} ON {scenariotable}.{scenarioabbrev} >= {lookuptable}.LowFlow AND {scenariotable}.{scenarioabbrev} < {lookuptable}.HighFlow)) WHERE {dateRange} ORDER BY WaterYear, InterHabitat) WHERE WaterYear BETWEEN {startyearlimit} AND {endyearlimit}

Metric.Name: Average all Habitat
Metric.SQL: SELECT WaterYear, AVG(InterHabitat) AS InterHabitat FROM (Select DateVal, yearInt, CASE WHEN dayInt>1000 THEN yearInt+1 ELSE yearInt END as WaterYear, ((LowVal + ((HighVal - LowVal) * (Flow - LowFlow)/(HighFlow - LowFlow))) / {normalization} * {reachLength})/10000 AS InterHabitat FROM (SELECT {scenariotable}.Date as DateVal, CAST(strftime('%Y', {scenariotable}.Date) AS INT) AS yearInt, (CAST(strftime('%m', {scenariotable}.Date) AS INT)*100 + CAST(strftime('%d', {scenariotable}.Date) AS INT)) AS dayInt, {scenariotable}.{scenarioabbrev} AS Flow, {lookuptable}.LowFlow AS LowFlow, {lookuptable}.HighFlow AS HighFlow, {lookuptable}.{lowvalue} AS LowVal, {lookuptable}.{highvalue} AS HighVal FROM ({lookuptable} INNER JOIN {scenariotable} ON {scenariotable}.{scenarioabbrev} >= {lookuptable}.LowFlow AND {scenariotable}.{scenarioabbrev} < {lookuptable}.HighFlow)) WHERE {dateRange} ORDER BY WaterYear, InterHabitat) WHERE WaterYear BETWEEN {startyearlimit} AND {endyearlimit}

Metric.Name: MarshVolume
Metric.SQL: Select DATE(REPLACE('2014-MM-15', 'MM', substr('00' || m, -2, 2))) as month, ((LowVal + ((HighVal - LowVal) * (Flow - LowFlow)/(HighFlow - LowFlow)))) AS MarshVolume FROM (Select * from (MarshVolLookup INNER JOIN (SELECT CAST(STRFTIME('%m', Date) as integer) as m, topock1 as flow from {scenariotable} GROUP BY STRFTIME('%m', Date)) ON flow >= MarshVolLookup.LowFlow AND flow < MarshVolLookup.HighFlow)) ORDER BY date(month)

Metric.Name: Monthly sum evapotraspiration
Metric.SQL: SELECT DATE(REPLACE('2014-MM-15', 'MM', substr('00' || CAST(STRFTIME('%m', Date) as integer), -2, 2))) as month, sum(ET_AF) as sumEvapoTrans from {scenariotable} GROUP BY STRFTIME('%m', Date)

Metric.Name: ChangeInMarshVolume
Metric.SQL: SELECT DATE(REPLACE('2014-MM-15', 'MM', substr('00' || m1, -2, 2))) as month, InterVolume1-InterVolume2 as ChangeInMarshVolume FROM (Select m1, ((LowVal + ((HighVal - LowVal) * (Flow - LowFlow)/(HighFlow - LowFlow)))) AS InterVolume1 FROM (Select * from (MarshVolLookup INNER JOIN (SELECT CAST(STRFTIME('%m', Date) as integer) as m1, topock1 as flow from {scenariotable} GROUP BY STRFTIME('%m', Date)) ON flow >= MarshVolLookup.LowFlow AND flow < MarshVolLookup.HighFlow)) ORDER BY m1) A JOIN (Select m2, ((LowVal + ((HighVal - LowVal) * (Flow - LowFlow)/(HighFlow - LowFlow)))) AS InterVolume2 FROM (Select * from (MarshVolLookup INNER JOIN (SELECT CAST(STRFTIME('%m', Date) as integer) as m2, topock1 as flow from {scenariotable} GROUP BY STRFTIME('%m', Date)) ON flow >= MarshVolLookup.LowFlow AND flow < MarshVolLookup.HighFlow)) ORDER BY m2) B ON A.m1 = B.m2+1

Metric.Name: TotalWaterRequired
Metric.SQL:
SELECT DATE(REPLACE('2014-MM-15', 'MM', substr('00' || ET.m, -2, 2))) as month, ET.ETsum + deltaVol.delta as TotalWaterRequired from ((SELECT CAST(STRFTIME('%m', Date) as integer) as m, sum(ET_AF) as ETsum from {scenariotable} GROUP BY STRFTIME('%m', Date)) ET JOIN ((SELECT m1 as m, InterVolume1-InterVolume2 as delta FROM (Select m1, ((LowVal + ((HighVal - LowVal) * (Flow - LowFlow)/(HighFlow - LowFlow)))) AS InterVolume1 FROM (Select * from (MarshVolLookup INNER JOIN (SELECT CAST(STRFTIME('%m', Date) as integer) as m1, topock1 as flow from {scenariotable} GROUP BY STRFTIME('%m', Date)) ON flow >= MarshVolLookup.LowFlow AND flow < MarshVolLookup.HighFlow)) ORDER BY m1) A JOIN (Select m2, ((LowVal + ((HighVal - LowVal) * (Flow - LowFlow)/(HighFlow - LowFlow)))) AS InterVolume2 FROM (Select * from (MarshVolLookup INNER JOIN (SELECT CAST(STRFTIME('%m', Date) as integer) as m2, topock1 as flow from {scenariotable} GROUP BY STRFTIME('%m', Date)) ON flow >= MarshVolLookup.LowFlow AND flow < MarshVolLookup.HighFlow)) ORDER BY m2) B ON A.m1 = B.m2+1)) deltaVol
ON ET.m = deltaVol.m)
select lowFlow/{flownormalizer}*{discharge_conversion} as discharge, {highvalue}/{norm}/10000*{habitat_conversion} as habitat from {lookuptable} WHERE discharge != 0 ORDER by discharge ASC
